servinfo.title: Transfer does not operate (Transfer position indicator does not operate)
servinfo.ptxt: Diagnose transfer assembly after performing the following inspections.

s1.ptxt: Perform 4WD control system check referring to 4WD Control System Check:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
Confirm 4WD control system operation referring to 4WD Control System Operation:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator)

condition.ptxt: Transfer does not operate (Transfer position indicator does not operate)

action.ptxt: Check switch referring to Transfer Switch Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
Check transfer shift actuator referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

ps.ptxt: 4L/N switch and/or switch center differential lock switch faulty

action.ptxt: Check switch referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

ps.ptxt: Transmission range sensor (“N” range) faulty (for A/T model)

action.ptxt: Adjust or check transmission range sensor referring to Transmission Range Sensor Inspection and Adjustment .
Check CPP switch referring to Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch Inspection and Adjustment .
Check 4WD control module referring to Inspection of 4WD Control Module and Its Circuits:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
